title: Migrate EXAMPLE.md content to Diátaxis structure
description:
Migrate content from EXAMPLE.md into the appropriate Diátaxis documentation structure and remove the legacy file.

## Content Mapping

**From EXAMPLE.md (723 lines) to:**

- `docs/tutorials/quickstart.md` - Basic CLI usage examples (Quick Note section, Setup)
- `docs/tutorials/first-workflow.md` - Complete agent orchestration example
- `docs/how-to/custom-gates.md` - Gate command examples and TDD workflow
- `docs/how-to/software-development.md` - Software development patterns
- `docs/reference/cli-commands.md` - CLI command reference examples

## Key Content to Preserve

- Short hash usage examples
- Labels are optional (simple usage patterns)
- Gate system examples (all gate commands)
- Agent orchestration workflow
- CLI command patterns with --json output

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All valuable content from EXAMPLE.md migrated to appropriate docs
- [ ] Gate command examples comprehensive (issue focus)
- [ ] TDD workflow documented
- [ ] EXAMPLE.md deleted (no redirects, clean removal)
- [ ] No broken references to EXAMPLE.md in codebase

## Related

Part of Epic cfb3ba94 (User Documentation Phase 2) - Story 48e2e917 (Gate System Documentation)
